name: Paradise: A Bartender's tale (captaindiz)
description:
Dayne, a simple bartender, earns his keep selling magic drinks in a quiet part of the big city. All manner of people come into bar, each with their own stories and troubles to tell.  It's a peaceful life listening to them talk.

But no matter how far he runs, or how insignificant he tries to become, Dayne can't leave his own story unfinished.
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Paradise: A Bartender's Tale is a visual novel centered around serving patrons magical drinks. It is inspired by VA-11 Hall-A.

This game is still in development, the demo is available to play now!
Please look forward to the full release!
